column1: #Text=This place is even more amazing than I imagined !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Name 's Bolin , by the way .
#Text=" Mako says : " I told you , you have to stop bringing your crazy fangirls in here before the matches .
#Text=Right , look , I kinda promised her she could stay , but man , I got a good feeling , there 's somethin' special about her .
#Text=Come here , I want you to meet my brother , Mako .
#Text=Wow , I - I heard you playing on the radio .
#Text=" Mako says : " Come on , Bolin , we 're up .
#Text=" Korra says : " ... or I could meet him later .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , sorry about that .
#Text=My brother just gets real ... focused before a match .
#Text=Okay , I got ta go , wish me luck .
